phrs.translation: 能浮起的, 吃水浅的, 浮动

sentences.sentence: But everyday, my whole body feels kind of floaty and light... I hope that's a good thing.
sentences.translation: 但是，每天我都觉得我的身体轻飘飘的……希望这是好的状况。

sentences.sentence: One more reason CG gets that "floaty" look is because it is so easy to set keys with the same timing.
sentences.translation: 另一个让CG动画看起来有“漂浮感”的原因是，使用相同的时间间隔设定出关键帧实在是太容易了。

sentences.sentence: Multiple messages can be selected out-of-order and operated upon immediately, using a floaty action bar.
sentences.translation: 用户现在可以无序的选择多条消息，而且可以使用浮动操作条立即对这些信息进行操作。
